      • updateLink

        @PUT
public void updateLink​(StickyNoteLink link)
                throws ColabMergeException
        Save changes to database. Only fields which are editable by users will be impacted.
        Parameters:
        link - link to update
        Throws:
        ColabMergeException - if the merge is not possible
